oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cartes de visite of Union veteran Fletcher Kennard and wife Ida
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Kennard and his wife were from Columbus, Ohio. He was in an Ohio regiment posted to Nashville where he was hospitalized at Lindsley Hall on the University of Nashville campus. His carte de visite was produced by V. S. Massey, photographer, in Lancaster, Ohio and bears a two-cent US Internal Revenue stamp on the back. Kennard is wearing civilian clothes. Ida's cdv also bears wartime revenue stamps and was photographed by M. I. Braddock in New Lexington, Ohio.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kennard, Fletcher; Kennard, Ida
